Package XMLParser

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Lexer
    The lexer is responsible for converting the passed xml in string format into a stream of Tokens.
    Token
    This class represents a single building block of an XML-File.
    Util
    Contains Utility-Functions like File-I/O operations.
    XMLParser
    This class represents the XML-Dataformat as a tree structure and offers the ability to load the datastructure from a given XML-File.
    XMLParser.XMLNode
    This class represents a single node in the XML-Tree.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    Token.TokenType
    Enum to describe the type of a token.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    MalformedXMLException
    This exception is thrown when it is attempted to barse bad XML input, or when the XML that is parsed does not follow the XML-Grammar.
